PatientDetails.Name: Joanna Sprague
HospitalCourse: Admitted on 09/19/2024 for NSTEMI complicated by cardiogenic shock.
Extubated on 09/28/2024 and re-intubated on the same day.
Developed fevers and leukocytosis, concerning for infection without a known source.

ElectronicMedicalRecords.HospitalDischarge: Discharged on 10/05/2024, condition improved but prognosis remains guarded.

InfectionIndicators.UnexplainedHypoxia: Desaturation events noted during MRI attempts

Sepsis.ClinicalNotes: Fever and leukocytosis without a known source; empiric antibiotics continued pending culture results.

BloodProducts.TransfusionEvents: Blood transfusions administered to maintain hemoglobin levels above 8 g/dL due to cardiac disease.
